summary: Some college kids accidently unleash a sex demon and she ends up turning a frat party inside out.
cast: Trixxie Bowie|Charles Laulette|Deborah Carlin|Al Darrouch|Michael McKay|Brenda Holiday|Gary Rubenstein|Josh Holland|Elaina Ballew|Dana Holyfield|Adam Lieberman|Kevin Driscoll|Victor Newmark|Daniel Engstrom|John Cooker|Alison Cuffe|Erin Callahan|Marty Kruse|Gibran Gold|Gary Rabinovich|Mark Allen Clark|Thomas Culhane|Sherry Kerr|Drew Peloso|Liz Morin|Toma Franki|Marc Dube|Carolyn Leone|Michael Feifer|Richard Feifer
title: Fraternity Demon
